name: reviews-and-ratings
title: Reviews and Ratings
description: An app for saving and retrieving product reviews and ratings.

allowAnonymousReviews.title: Allow Anonymous Reviews
allowAnonymousReviews.description: Allow shoppers to submit reviews even if they are not logged in

requireApproval.title: Require Admin Approval
requireApproval.description: Require administrator approval before newly submitted reviews are displayed

useLocation.title: Ask for Reviewer's Location
useLocation.description: Include a field for reviewer to input their location when submitting review

defaultOpen.title: Default all review accordions to open
defaultOpen.description: All review tabs on product page will default to open with review text truncated to x characters

defaultOpenCount.title: Number of open review accordions
defaultOpenCount.description: Specified number of review tabs on product page will default to open

showGraph.title: Display graph
showGraph.description: Display the reviews graph on product page
